item.description:
Tickets are nearly sold out. Please update your RSVP.

This is a joint-meetup with the Red Sox Natives,The Wine Meetup and Social Fun.

Celebrate the 5th anniversary of Boston Uncorked at a Wine Party at Vox Populi on Friday, March 26 from 7- 9 pm and beyond. You get the whole second floor of the Vox as a private enclave to sample wine, and it is a great place to hang out afterward for an after party among friends old and new.

Taste from a large selection of reds, whites and ports from around the world. Enjoy tasty hors d'oeuvres from the Vox kitchen. Special features include a fifth wine table and chocolaty treats by Sugar Me Cookie Dough. And get a little Uncorked with Jay, Rob, Susan, Hillary, Vincent and Jen. and launch the start of Boston Uncorked 6th year of hosting intriguing and educational wine events throughout Boston.

I have been attending their events since the beginning and they are a must attend for all.

Everything that you need to know about the event is on the Boston Uncorked website.

To purchase tickets go to . Please buy your tickets early as over 90% of their events sell out, some within days of posting. This event takes place on a Friday night so no excuses not to attend. Cost is $39.00.

See you there!

Frank
item.name: Boston Uncorked 5th Anniversary Wine Party at Vox Populi
